price: Ele disse: "Guarde-nos Allah de tomarmos outro que aquele junto de quem encontramos o que nos pertence! Por certo, nesse caso, seríamos injustos"
arabic: قَالَ مَعَاذَ ٱللَّهِ أَن نَّأۡخُذَ إِلَّا مَن وَجَدۡنَا مَتَٰعَنَا عِندَهُۥٓ إِنَّآ إِذٗا لَّظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla maʿādha al-lahi an nakhudha illā man wajadnā matāʿanā ʿindahu innā idhan laẓālimūna
